basic.description: Study of strategies to enhance intrinsic motivation and self-regulation for physical activity and health behaviour change in clinical settings. Students will learn and practice motivational interviewing skills for behaviour change in intensive weekly tutorial sessions.
basic.subject: KNPE
basic.title: Physical Activity and Health Behaviour Counseling

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    Level 3 or above in a PHED,KINE or HLTH Plan and PSYC100 and (KNPE265 or HLTH315]).
